Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class QwuiRessourceProviderFactory< T >

A helper class used to instanciate factories for ressource providers. Example:. 

 QwuiRessourceProviderFactory<MyspecificProvider> factory;
 QwuiAbstractRessourceProvider* provider = factory.create("sessionId");
